name: Witching Hour
description:
Witching Hour is a horror-themed zombie wave shooter.
You must survive with your AK until the clock stikes 12
Zombies will come at you from every angle.
The game features a body cam perspective.
In Witching Hour the player will be able to walk around and sprint, as well as shoot their rifle at different types of entities.
Witching hour also gives the player a flashlight that can be turned on and off.
Witching hour features four different types of entities:
The zombie: slow moving entity that is practically harmless on its own but can be very dangerous in numbers.
The skinwalker: A fast moving entity disguised as a mannequin that only moves when the player cannot see it.
The mutant: A large entity that is harder to kill and is only visible when the flashlight is off.
The speed demon: a small but very fast moving entity that will stop at nothing to kill you.
